# delegate

**Instance Property**

The custom object you use to respond to port-based connection attempts.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any VZVirtioSocketListenerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Your delegate object must conform to the [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZVirtioSocketListenerDelegate] protocol.

## Responding to new connections

- **VZVirtioSocketListenerDelegate**: An interface you use to manage connections between the guest operating system and host computer.
